title: VEL'KOZ CHARGED THUNDER SKIN!
body: 1. get ready guys how about (Vel koz THUNDER SKIN!)i .......{{champion:161}}

replies.body: Wheatley? What are you doing here?
Say apple.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=5ETx7cBB,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-05-03T19:18:38.046+0000)
>
> Say apple.

*jumps*
I actually giggled at this. That was probably my favorite opening to a game ever.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=5ETx7cBB,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2015-05-03T20:10:01.737+0000)
>
> I actually giggled at this. That was probably my favorite opening to a game ever.

...

but what about Far Cry 3: Blood Dragon? ;-;

apparently, it's wheatly with tentacles
(tentacle hentai jokes incoming)

This is not a skin, just chroma pack fodder.

It takes more than a cheap 5-second hue shift to make a proper skin.

True, but rather than just making it blue they could, animate lightning bolts moving around his tentacles and eye(s), new particle effects and sounds, new "disappears into storm clouds" recall, electric slide dance etc.  a simple image only shows the concept of the skin, there's nothing saying that's all it has to be

Actually, the custom skin that splash art belongs to—Wheatley Vel'Koz—is easily a 975 RP skin. Custom particles that fit the theme of Wheatley's mechanical form, ability icons were changed, and even the joke animation had a Portal reference thrown in. I very much recommend looking up the skin on a place like MobaSkins.
thanks guys:){{champion:161}}AND IGNORE THE PICTURE IT LOOKS LIKE WHAETLEY BUT IT'S NOT HIM!

The picture is literally titled "Wheatley Vel'Koz".

There's also a Wheatley Vel'Koz custom skin that uses that exact splash art, and has custom particles and a Portal-referencing joke animation.
I would hope that it has more thematic than just that. Otherwise couldn't we just get this as a Chroma?
I think it should be renamed, and it should be a Portal skin.
That splash art actually belongs to a custom skin called Wheatley Vel'Koz, and you can find it on MobaSkins. I greatly encourage checking it out.
That's B.S. then. He got a splash art from somewhere else, didn't credit the artist and renamed it. When we can see the image name. Disgrace to {{champion:161}}.

Actually his skills fit to thunder theme because if Q is a thunder it will be bounce, his W can be cloud with thunders, his E can be a lightning bolt who shock enemies themetically, ult can be a thunder minigun who has thunder sounds so often.
I just found this in a google image search. This is really cool. Rito plz. Take my money.
chrome pack?
like a legendary chroma pack?
So they name chromas?
Decent reskin. would buy.
Awesome! :) Want it!
